channel.title: How to add owner has just logged in to a 639 or 711
channel.description: So lets say the owner just logged in it would say owner______ has logged in can anyone give me a code or file to go to to edit this thanks

item.description:
@xplode wrote:

i get 100 errors when i do this… im currently trying to figure out the problem over and over again…

item.title: How to add owner has just logged in to a 639 or 711
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

711:
Player.java
find getPackets().sendGameMessage("Welcome to " + Settings.SERVER_NAME + ".");

above it add

if (getRights() == 3) { for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) { p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<col=FF0000><shad=000000>Admin " + getUsername() + " has logged in."); } } else if (getRights() == 2) { for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) { p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<col=FF6600><shad=000000>Moderator " + getUsername() + " has logged in."); } } else if (getRights() == 1) { for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) { p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<col=FF6600><shad=000000>Donator " + getUsername() + " has logged in."); } } else if (getRights() == 4) { for (Player p : World.getPlayers()) { p.getPackets().sendGameMessage("<col=FF6600><shad=000000>Owner " + getUsername() + " has logged in."); }

Enjoy

Read full topic
